rooms.description: Small foyer space to welcome guests, ensuring a clean and Vastu-compliant entrance.

rooms.room_name: Living Room / Kitchen Combined Open-plan Area
rooms.description: A combined living and kitchen area that maximizes open space, encourages joint family interaction while adhering to colonial aesthetics. The layout optimizes natural light entry and ventilation, with Vastu guidelines in mind for the placement of cooking activities.
Spacious bedroom designed with ample storage, maintaining privacy for the head of family while ensuring a calming atmosphere following colonial design elements.
Multi-purpose room that can serve as a study or guest room. Utilizes space efficiently on an irregular plot, keeping a flexible layout in line with joint family needs.
Compact bathroom designed for utility and ease of access, incorporating Vastu guidelines by orienting entrances appropriately.

openings.description: Ensures optimal entry as per Vastu principles. The door is oriented towards the south to facilitate a positive flow of energy.
Large windows on east and west walls provide natural light, enhancing the colonial aesthetic while following Vastu guidelines for illumination.
A small balcony providing ventilation and outdoor access. The north-facing orientation is balanced with other design elements.
